page.title: 11LEISURE AMENITIES
page.content:
The following is a list of the leisure amenities within the D-block:
{Public Houses....8 Workingmen's club 1 {Hotels...........2 Youth clubs.......2 {Libraries........2 Football pitches..3 {Playgrounds......4 Community centres.2 {Marching jazz bands..................2 {"Rail Trail" country walk............1 { Other amenities are available at Bishop Auckland ( 3 miles ), Shildon ( 4 miles ), Spennymoor ( 7 miles ), Willington ( 7 miles ), Darlington ( 12 miles ), & Durham ( 14 miles ).
Nearest theatre : Darlington Nearest cinemas : Darlington, Durham.
